name: EVENT HOUR
description:
Welcome to the game "Event Hour"

 Game Overview //

 The game is of the type of puzzles and in-depth thinking, as well as research, exploration and time travel

 How to Play//

 In the beginning, there is the main menu, which contains 3 buttons. The first is to enter the selection room and start playing

 And the second is our website

 And the third is the exit button

 After entering the selection room, you will see a portal and a computer in front of it. Go to it and point to it with the sign on the screen, and press the left mouse button to open the door. Then you will find a portal to travel through time, and there is another computer next to it. Go to it and press the mouse button to open it for you. checklist

 There is an audio explanation inside each map that you must listen to carefully in order to know what your mission is

 Missions //

 The first map, you must collect data in papers distributed in the map and enter them to deactivate the nuclear reactor

 The second map is a desert map, and your task in this map is to search for the missing king's crown before the time limit ends

 The third map is a spacecraft map, and your task is to detonate the meteor that is heading towards the Earth

 information//

 1- We worked on the game for about five days intermittently, which is an estimated three hours a day in general, which is equivalent to 24 hours.

 2- What has been accomplished during this period?

 * Three complete levels are designed

 * The U.I. was produced and designed

 * Lots of utilities searched (ASSETS)

 * A cutscene has been created on the third level

 * The game was fully programmed as (ALPHA) version

 We were not fully dedicated to completing the game to the fullest (the game lacks many factors)

 What we intended to add:-

 * Movie scenes

 Realistic lighting

 * Main voices and characters

 * Color processing (Post Processing)

 * Many puzzles and diversity in the way of playing

 * Interaction with the environment

 Moving sky

 * Add Arabic speaking

 * Adding translations and texts to the screen and an assistant system for the player

 * Add a realistic movement to the traffic

 Unfortunately, time did not support us in order to show you our true level, and I hope that everyone takes into account that the duration of work on this game is approximately (18-24 hours maximum)

 Thank you for your opinions in advance and we wish you a good time and an enjoyable experience

 I wish you best wishes

 This is Mohamed Dev from the WOLF EVIL team
